医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
革命性的干细胞培养方法产生人类中枢神经系统的完整模型密歇根大学、魏茨曼科学研究所和宾夕法尼亚大学的工程师和生物学家团队开发了第一种产生人类中枢神经系统早期阶段完整模型的干细胞培养方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Revolutionary-stem-cell-culture-method- Produces-full-model-of- human-central-nervous-system.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Revolutionary-stem-cell-culture-method- Produces-full-model-of- human-central-nervous-system.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=672a0626-7bd7-4059-b496-f09360770a1a Mon, 26 Feb 2024 13:14:01 -0500 Revolutionary stem cell culture method produces full model of human central nervous system
研究揭示了患有心脏损伤的 COVID-19 患者的早期死亡预测因素宣布在《心血管创新与应用》杂志上发表新文章。入院时免疫和血栓生物标志物的激活以及它们预测 COVID-19 心脏损伤和死亡模式的能力仍不清楚。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Study-reveals-early-death-predictors-in-COVID-19-病人-with-cardiac-injury.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Study-reveals-early-death-predictors-in-COVID-19-病人-with-cardiac-injury.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=872fc1b1-9e35-4cdf-956d-bc2a534d1315 Mon, 26 Feb 2024 13:00:59 -0500 Study reveals early death predictors in COVID-19 patients with cardiac injury
针对无证移民的驾驶执照法与改善出生结果有关2023 年，罗德岛州、马萨诸塞州和明尼苏达州加入了越来越多的州行列，允许无证移民获得驾驶执照，前提是申请人能够提供某些文件，例如外国出生证明或护照以及当前在该州居住的证据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Drivers-license-laws-for-undocumented-immigrants-linked-to-improved-birth-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Drivers-license-laws-for-undocumented-immigrants-linked-to-improved-birth-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bbf766ac-ea6a-4113-b54c-75f2f97aa9a4 Mon, 26 Feb 2024 12:52:13 -0500 Driver's license laws for undocumented immigrants linked to improved birth outcomes
对糖尿病心肌病、海马神经毒性和阿尔茨海默病病理学的新见解DCM 是慢性糖尿病患者心力衰竭的主要原因。然而，人们对 DCM 的潜在机制知之甚少，治疗选择也有限。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Novel-insights-into-pathologies-of-diabetic-cardiomyopathy-hippocampal-neuro毒性-and-Alzheimere28099s.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Novel-insights-into-pathologies-of-diabetic-cardiomyopathy-hippocampal-neuro毒性-and-Alzheimere28099s.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1892dddc-491f-4a1d-a786-afb0d1ca91e5 Mon, 26 Feb 2024 12:44:03 -0500 Novel insights into pathologies of diabetic cardiomyopathy, hippocampal neurotoxicity, and Alzheimer’s
研究发现说话速度对于评估老年人的认知健康至关重要随着年龄的增长，我们可能会开始注意到我们需要更长的时间才能找到合适的词语。这可能会导致人们对认知能力下降和痴呆症的担忧。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Talking-speed-crucial-for-assessing-cognitive-health-in-older-adults-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Talking-speed-crucial-for-assessing-cognitive-health-in-older-adults-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=57b955d5-f9ca-4afe-b5fb-ba45fc352028 Mon, 26 Feb 2024 11:47:30 -0500 Talking speed crucial for assessing cognitive health in older adults, study finds
AGA 研究基金会获得 140 万美元捐赠资金用于胰腺癌研究AGA 研究基金会宣布从 Bern Schwartz 家族基金会获得 140 万美元的捐赠资金。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/AGA-Research-Foundation-secures-2414-million-endowment-grant-for-pancreatic-cancer-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/AGA-Research-Foundation-secures-2414-million-endowment-grant-for-pancreatic-cancer-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7c1f86e0-bf0d-46c3-8206-7b6b8a4a2299 Mon, 26 Feb 2024 11:42:24 -0500 AGA Research Foundation secures $1.4 million endowment grant for pancreatic cancer research
利用多组学和人工智能进行动脉粥样硬化性心血管疾病管理尽管在挽救生命方面取得了巨大进展，但心血管疾病 (CVD) 仍然是全球死亡的主要原因，估计每年夺去 1790 万人的生命。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Harnessing-multi-omics-and-AI-for-atherosclerotic-cardioangio-disease-management.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Harnessing-multi-omics-and-AI-for-atherosclerotic-cardioangio-disease-management.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ec89e7fb-fa0a-4ef4-99b4-fe8a320ae625 Mon, 26 Feb 2024 11:37:55 -0500 Harnessing multi-omics and AI for atherosclerotic cardiovascular disease management
医疗保健领导人倡导恢复加拿大的高血压控制计划爱思唯尔出版的《加拿大心脏病学杂志》发表社论，热情呼吁重建加拿大健康联盟，重点关注高血压预防和控制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Healthcare-leaders-advocate-for-restoring-Canadas-hypertension-control-program.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Healthcare-leaders-advocate-for-restoring-Canadas-hypertension-control-program.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b3de693a-00b0-4672-afc8-9a01f59edbc6 Mon, 26 Feb 2024 11:33:23 -0500 Healthcare leaders advocate for restoring Canada's hypertension control program
研究发现，在 COVID-19 大流行期间，青少年和年轻人的抗抑郁药物配发量急剧增加一项新的研究发现，在 COVID-19 大流行开始后，向青少年和年轻人配发的抗抑郁药物急剧增加，尤其是在女性中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Study-finds-sharp-increase-in-antidepressant-dispensing-among-adolescents-and-young-adults-during-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Study-finds-sharp-increase-in-antidepressant-dispensing-among-adolescents-and-young-adults-during-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=44247501-b17b-427d-a597-8a36e8f701f6 Mon, 26 Feb 2024 11:26:31 -0500 Study finds sharp increase in antidepressant dispensing among adolescents and young adults during COVID-19 pandemic
研究发现 SNAP 福利可以提高食品不安全人群的药物依从性补充营养援助计划 (SNAP) 福利。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Study-finds-SNAP-benefits-may-improve-medication-adherence-among-food-insecure-individuals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Study-finds-SNAP-benefits-may-improve-medication-adherence-among-food-insecure-individuals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=86aca01d-b490-47e2-8ee8-e3fc1b7e88d5 Mon, 26 Feb 2024 08:42:00 -0500 Study finds SNAP benefits may improve medication adherence among food-insecure individuals
